app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps VTrimmer
app_description: This is an app for trimming video easily like these 3 steps bellow. How to use. 1.Tap Video Camera Icon to open your camera roll and select a video you want to trim. 2.You can set the starting ending time with the slider has 2 thumbs. 3.When you press save button the video will be trimmed and saved to camera roll. Tips Press Clock Button to open time picker. Then you can select time detailedly like each 0.01 sec.
